stance_1: I am concerned about environmental impact

stance_2: I still eat red meat occasionally
justification: A pescatarian diet typically excludes red meat, so occasional red meat consumption is in tension with this stance.

justification: Openness to change contrasts with the lack of actual change in meat-eating habits among family and friends.
